caption: Account
description: The account object describes details about the account that was the source of the activity.
name: account

name.caption: Account Name
name.description: The name of the account (e.g. GCP Account Name).

type.caption: Account Type
type.description: The user account type, normalized to the caption of 'account_type_id'. In the case of 'Other', it is defined by the event source.

type_id.caption: Account Type ID
type_id.description: The normalized user account type identifier.

99.caption: Other
99.description: The user account type is not mapped.

0.caption: Unknown
0.description: The user account type is unknown.

uid.caption: Account UID
uid.description: The unique identifier of the account (e.g. AWS Account ID).
